name: HD Slice + Visualization
note:
Mesh Primitive → HD Slice Engine → Motion Planner → Scalar Field → Strand Mesher.

Try: switch overlay to speed/flow and toggle mesh render mode.

name: Planar Slice — Cube
note:
Mesh Primitive → Slicer → Export. A clean planar slicing baseline.

Try: adjust layer height or infill density on the Slicer node.

name: Feature Paint + Travel Optimize
note:
Mesh Primitive → Slicer → Feature Paint → Travel Optimize → Export.

Try: tweak rules for walls/top/infill in Feature Paint.

name: Non-Planar Wave
note:
Path → Z Warp → Rules → Export.

Try: adjust amplitude/wavelength in Z Warp or the fan ramp in Rules.
